thread.title: Beyonce, Prince and Jay Z to headline Tidal concert
thread.title_full: Beyonce, Prince and Jay Z to headline Tidal concert - CBS News

author: CBS/AP
title: Beyonce, Prince and Jay Z to headline Tidal concert
text:
Streaming service Tidal is putting together an all-star concert starring Beyonce , Prince and Jay Z on Oct. 20.
The music and video streaming platform announced "TIDAL X: 1020 Amplified by HTC," which will take place at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York.
Play Video CBSN Why Jay-Z's music streaming venture might be failing Tidal, Jay-Z's new streaming service, launched with high hopes in March -- but it's already run into big problems, Music writer Joe Levy joins CB...
The concert will also include Nicki Minaj, Usher, Lil Wayne, Damian Marley, Thomas Rhett, Indochine and T.I. Several budding stars will also be there, including Alessia Cara, Bas, Benjamin Booker, Flatbush Zombies and Justine Skye.
Tickets for Tidal subscribers go on sale Wednesday and will be widely available Friday. Tickets range from $74 through $244 and all of the ticket sales will support charities through the New World Foundation.
Tidal, which is owned by Jay Z, Beyonce, Madonna, Rihanna and other artists, has struggled to compete with Spotify and others since it was launched this year.
